body_html:
As I know, control_depencies() tensorflow can't treat 'for' loop in paralell

or, how about using

while_loop(
    cond,
    body,
    loop_vars,
    shape_invariants=None,
    parallel_iterations=10,
    back_prop=True,
    swap_memory=False,
    name=None
)

instead of ' for ' loop ?

body:
As I know, control_depencies() tensorflow can't treat 'for' loop in paralell

or, how about using 
```
while_loop(
    cond,
    body,
    loop_vars,
    shape_invariants=None,
    parallel_iterations=10,
    back_prop=True,
    swap_memory=False,
    name=None
)
```
instead of ' for ' loop ?
